Title: Establishes the first-generation homebuyer assistance program
Summary: Establishes the first-generation homebuyer assistance program to provide a zero-interest, forgivable loan award in the amount of up to $15,000 to first-generation homebuyers.
LawCode: Add ยง2428-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the first-generation homebuyer assistance program
